headline: AT&T COO compares its coverage reliability to T-Mobile's claims
summary: Through a new ad campaign, AT&T (T) is firing back at T-Mobile's (TMUS) claims around the latter's network coverage size in the US. AT&T Chief Operating Officer Jeff McElfresh comes on Market Catalysts to talk about AT&T's coverage performance and reliability from consumers. Hear Jeff McElfresh discuss AT&T's differences with T-Mobile further by clicking here. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: AT&T Violates BBB National Programs' National Advertising Division Procedures
summary: BBB National Programs' National Advertising Division today determined that AT&T Services, Inc. violated Section 2.1(I) of the National Advertising Division (NAD)/National Advertising Review Board (NARB) Procedures for the U.S. advertising industry's process of self-regulation by issuing a press release and video advertisement that use the NAD process and its findings for promotional purposes.

content.title: AT&T Violates BBB National Programs' National Advertising Division Procedures
content.summary: BBB National Programs' National Advertising Division today determined that AT&T Services, Inc. violated Section 2.1(I) of the National Advertising Division (NAD)/National Advertising Review Board (NARB) Procedures for the U.S. advertising industry's process of self-regulation by issuing a press release and video advertisement that use the NAD process and its findings for promotional purposes.
